Class Meeting

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meeting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Meeting
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A data-oriented class. Meetings are contained within Conferences. They contain ConferencePapers.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
